name: Sniper 3D Assassin: Shoot to Kill
description:
Sniper 3D Assassin® in 7 words: great gameplay, awesome visuals and entertaining missions.Hundreds of challenging missionsPlay in over 850+ thrilling missions and 13 different worlds as you dive in this addictive gameDevelop your sniper skillsEmbark on real world operations when shooting under rain, wind and fog. Try to hit moving targets from unstable platformsTons of customizable weaponsMake sure you explore your arsenal's full potential by customizing over 150+ snipers and riflesEnjoy limited time eventsHave fun killing the most zombies and robots in each event to earn exclusive rewards. In this combat fighting mode, you are racing against time and real rivals to prevent a 3rd World WarBecome an owner nowDownload now for free and have access to frequent updates and new game content periodically


Sniper 3D Assassin® is brought to you by Fun Games For Free
